com.esri.mo2.ui.tb
Class SelectionToolBarActions

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn.Actions
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.ui.tb.SelectionToolBarActions
public class SelectionToolBarActions
extends Actions

The SelectionToolBarActions class is a collection of Action objects. The actions specially works on a Map object doing spatial selection by mouse's draging or attribute query. The Actions in the class could be added into a toolbar or menu.

Method Detail

setMap

public void setMap(Map map)
Sets the Map bean associated with this ToolBar.

Parameters:
map - the Map bean

setIdentifiableFields

public void setIdentifiableFields(Layer layer,
                                  Strings fieldList)
Sets the identifiable fields for this particular layer. The com.esri.mo2.util.Strings either contains String objects as the field names (in which case the alias will be the same) or NameValuePair(name,value) objects (in which case the value will be used as an alias for name).

Parameters:
layer - the selected layer
fieldList - a list of fields to be displayed
